title: PROPOSAL TO IMPROVE THE RANKED SYSTEM.
body:
Have you ever had someone in your team trolling or going afk in a **WON** Ranked Match?
Have you ever been so pissed to lose 19-25 LP Just because someone trolled?

Riot games have made that amazing feature of /remake that really helps in terms of not losing lp if someone goes afk in a match. I UNDERSTAND, that it cannot be improved to be allowed past 3 minutes because then if you are losing you'd just go afk and take minimal consequences (especially if playing with a premade, you can do this on turns) 

**BUT THERE IS A WAY TO IMPROVE IT EVEN MORE.**

Okay so we all know how the report system works, 
1.  You Report Someone.
2.  The person that you reported gets reported from many peaple cause it was really a toxic player.
3.  Toxic player gets consequences, and you get that advice riot gives you that tells you they got consequences.

NOW. I know a lot of peaple use reports randomly and that some 4 man premades reporting 1 player may disrupt this system **BUT**

**WHAT IF WHEN YOU LOSE A RANKED MATCH BECAUSE SOMEONE ON THE TEAM HAD TOXIC BEHAVIOR, AND GOT CONSEQUENCES, YOU DON'T LOSE LP / YOU LOSE LESS OF THEM?**

Obviously, to make the system fair, 
1. The player reported loses the most LP, Like with the /remake Mechanic.
2. The winning team gets LESS LP, (like 10 or so) because even if they played well, it was an unfair match.

What do you think about this idea? Please bump so riot reads this.

OG Mistery, EUW
